question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. bus
B. bicycles
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The bicycles are parked on the sidewalk in the immediate foreground, while the bus is on the road further away, making their relative depth very obvious from the 2D image.
